analysis.description:
OldXRPCToken (/unique_contracts/0x8fd448a435f6c7613a043f6d1f7bb861264463fa.sol#98-105) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x8fd448a435f6c7613a043f6d1f7bb861264463fa.sol#98-99)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x8fd448a435f6c7613a043f6d1f7bb861264463fa.sol:
	Contract CryptoBonesToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x8fd448a435f6c7613a043f6d1f7bb861264463fa.sol#238-240)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x8fd448a435f6c7613a043f6d1f7bb861264463fa.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x8fd448a435f6c7613a043f6d1f7bb861264463fa.sol#5-7): it allows old versions
